participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Emma loves to express herself through music and enjoys adventures with friends.
participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i am in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Resilient and motivational, Michael is passionate about health and fitness, always inspiring others to pursue their goals.
participant_2.background: i am a cancer survivor. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons.
